description: A pair of mysterious assassin brothers named Rock and Scotch who work for hire. They are described as deadly killers who will murder anyone for the right price. No one has reportedly seen them and lived.

firstAppearance.context: Caesar Clown dispatches them to eliminate the Straw Hat Pirates

statusHistory.reason: Introduced as active assassins working for Caesar Clown

reputation: Deadly assassins that no one has reportedly seen and survived

keyEvents.title: Hired by Caesar to Eliminate Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Caesar Clown dispatches the Yeti Cool Brothers to kill the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: First mission introduced in the series

keyEvents.title: Successfully Defeat Zoro, Sanji, and Brook
keyEvents.description: The brothers successfully ambush and defeat three powerful Straw Hat members.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes them as a serious threat
